column3: We all know the traditional model of a terrorist network. One cell controlling all others. Cut off the head and the body will wither.

I'm ... just ... Linda Litzke. Harry stares at her. A long beat. He leaps to his feet and looks around in a panic. His point-of-view, sweeping the park. Nearby, the man with plugs, though talking with his date, is looking at him again. Farther away, a man sits in a curbside sedan. Watching? Hard to say. Harry turns and runs.       Linda gapes.
